newsitem.title: UK: German inland gas oil retreats, demand slack.
newsitem.headline: German inland gas oil retreats, demand slack.

text.p: (DLR/DM=1.8129) DM/100 LTRS DLRS/100 LTRS LAST DM

German inland gas oil prices were marked down by around 20 to 40 pfennigs. The dollar remains strong above 1.81 marks in Europe, raising inland values and curbing spot demand. --London Newsroom +44 171 542 7646
